description: Try our easy to follow Cupcake Cones with Mascarpone Frosting recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cupcake Cones with Mascarpone Frosting Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Stand the wafer cups in a roasting pan.
Beat butter and sugar together until creamy and pale.

Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add flour and vanilla and beat on low speed until the mixture has thickened. Spoon mixture into cups. Bake for 2025 minutes or until golden and a skewer inserted in the centre of 1 cake comes out clean. Set aside to cool.
To make the frosting, beat mascarpone with cream and icing sugar until smooth. Spread frosting over cupcakes and scatter with rainbow sprinkles.
